metadata.title: CVE-2017-0592 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in FLACExtractor.cpp inlibstagefright in Mediaserver could enable an attacker using a speciallycrafted file to cause memory corruption during media file and dataprocessing. This issue is rated as Critical due to the possibility ofremote code execution within the context of the Mediaserver process.Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1,7.1.2. Android ID: A-34970788.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
